ActionAuctionPlat.newAuction (/unique_chucks/19/0x07f98e3eb47e6873fa7b85b5b8f088bb2b2e94a3.sol#757-795) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)((oldOrder.tmStart + auctionDuration) <= tmNow || oldOrder.tmSell > 0) (/unique_chucks/19/0x07f98e3eb47e6873fa7b85b5b8f088bb2b2e94a3.sol#776-779)
	- tmNow >= lastActionStart (/unique_chucks/19/0x07f98e3eb47e6873fa7b85b5b8f088bb2b2e94a3.sol#790-792)
	- lastIndex > 0 (/unique_chucks/19/0x07f98e3eb47e6873fa7b85b5b8f088bb2b2e94a3.sol#771-779)
